chunks.title: Section 1 - Short title
chunks.structure_path: Franchise Fees Windfall Tax (Imposition) Act 1997 > Section 1
chunks.text:
This Act may be cited as the Franchise Fees Windfall Tax
(Imposition) Act 1997.
FRANCHISE FEES WINDFALL TAX (IMPOSITION) ACT 1997 No. 133 of 1997

chunks.title: Section 2 - Commencement
chunks.structure_path: Franchise Fees Windfall Tax (Imposition) Act 1997 > Section 2
chunks.text:
This Act is taken to have commenced at the same time as the
Franchise Fees Windfall Tax (Collection) Act 1997.
FRANCHISE FEES WINDFALL TAX (IMPOSITION) ACT 1997 No. 133 of 1997

chunks.title: Section 3 - This Act binds the Crown
chunks.structure_path: Franchise Fees Windfall Tax (Imposition) Act 1997 > Section 3
chunks.text:
This Act binds the Crown in each of its capacities.
FRANCHISE FEES WINDFALL TAX (IMPOSITION) ACT 1997 No. 133 of 1997
- Section 4 Imposition of franchise fees windfall tax
  (1) Franchise fees windfall tax is hereby imposed at the rate of
100%.
  (2) In this section:
franchise fees windfall tax means the tax that is payable under the
Franchise Fees Windfall Tax (Collection) Act 1997.
[Minister's second reading speech made inÂ¾
          House of Representatives on 28 August 1997
          Senate on 3 September 1997]

chunks.title: Section 4 - Imposition of franchise fees windfall tax
